name: prisma-article-example
description: <<Prisma: 下一代ORM, 不仅仅是ORM>> Demo 仓库

scripts.flow: npm run gen:client && npm run build && npm run invoke
scripts.generate:single: cd ./src/single-model && prisma db push --preview-feature && prisma generate
scripts.generate:multi: cd ./src/multi-models && prisma db push --preview-feature && prisma generate
scripts.generate:advanced: cd ./src/multi-models-advanced && prisma db push --preview-feature && prisma generate
scripts.generate:graphql: cd ./src/typegraphql-apollo-server && prisma db push --preview-feature && prisma generate
scripts.generate:multi-db: npm run pre-generate:multi-db-key && npm run pre-generate:multi-db-value
scripts.generate:with-typeorm: cd ./src/with-typeorm && prisma db push --preview-feature && prisma generate
scripts.generate:with-typegoose: cd ./src/with-typegoose && prisma db push --preview-feature && prisma generate
scripts.pre-generate:multi-db-key: cd ./src/multi-clients && prisma db push --schema=./prisma-key/schema.prisma --preview-feature && prisma generate --schema=./prisma-key/schema.prisma
scripts.pre-generate:multi-db-value: cd ./src/multi-clients && prisma db push --schema=./prisma-value/schema.prisma --preview-feature && prisma generate --schema=./prisma-value/schema.prisma
scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run init
scripts.init:multi-db: npm run pre-init:multi-db-key && npm run pre-init:multi-db-value
scripts.__META_EXPLAIN_1__: command 'prisma db push' will also execute the client generation, so in multi-clients post-build we only copy schema
scripts.pretest: cd ./src/typegraphql-apollo-server && rimraf -rf todo.sqlite && prisma db push --preview-feature && prisma db seed --preview-feature

author: linbudu599
